ModMetaData.name: Revia upgraded
ModMetaData.author: Slomow
ModMetaData.description:
This mod add Revia Empire , a highly powerfull empire with own permits and requiements, this faction have an organized military system never been seen before in the rim , the revia empire have build their bases almost imposibble to crack even for the human empire.
you better be prepare if you want to attack them.
